title: Sans serif
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
Looks like Lucida Sans (which comes with both the Mac OS and MS-Windows systems):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/lucida-sans/")
Thank you! Yes it does look like it.
